data.title: Sk Sujauddin's Review On Chandidas Mahavidyalaya, Birbhum
data.text:
Course Curriculum Overview

4

There is faculty: student ratio of about 5:200. The facilities are highly qualified and some are studied from abroad. The faculties are very friendly to us and their teaching methods are really good and use lots of examples while teaching. The exams are conducted regularly. There is not much difficulty to pass the exams.

Campus Life

4.5

The college and students union togetherly conduct fresher party,swarsati puja, annual sports function, and the great annual fest. The annual fest is conducted in December. There are lots of books available at the library. Students can collect any books they want through their library card provided by the college. The general students can collect up to 2 books and the honors students can collect up to 3 books. There are 4 smart classrooms, lots of laboratories and the other classrooms are very comfortable and in the class rooms air conditioner is available. Extra curricular activities are also conducted by the college and the student union like clearing the drainage, planting beside the street, awareness of the local people about dengue, etc.

Admission

There is nothing such as eligibility for admission in this college, students only should be High Secondary passed. Students can apply for admission through the online process as well as the offline process. And the verification process runs through only the offline process. Application fees for B. A passed course is 1430 rupees. And the online admission process runs very smoothly.

Placement Experience :

We are offered placement opportunities from our final semester. Big companies like Amazon, TCS, HCL, HP, Wipro, Virtusa and many more which have tie-ups with the University visit our campus to conduct interviews and offer us jobs. Almost all the good students get placed if they can perform well in the interview. The University also provides us with special training to help us crack the placement interviews with ease. Highest salary has gone as up as 32 LPA while the average salary stays around 5-6 LPA. I too plan to sit for the interview and get placed at a reputed company after getting the degree.

...Read More
